summary: Societal expectations about the fleeting nature of initial marital bliss create underlying anxiety for individuals, influencing their perception of happiness."
The anticipation of losing current happiness can lead individuals to fear the future, impacting their ability to fully enjoy the present."
By focusing on cherishing each moment, individuals can transform potential anxiety into a deeper appreciation for their current experiences."
Deliberate efforts to nurture positive experiences can help sustain joy and passion, integrating them into a long-term relationship."
Individuals can choose to adapt to potential challenges by proactively reinforcing positive aspects of their relationship, ensuring resilience and continuity."
